name: Splitgate: Arena Warfare - Founder's Edition
detailed_description:
Enter the arena in STYLE with the Splitgate: Arena Warfare Founder's Edition.

Founder's Edition EXCLUSIVE Armor Set: Dweller

Dweller armor is EXCLUSIVE to those who support the Splitgate: Arena Warfare developers by purchasing the Founder's Edition. This set (head, chest, legs) is the ONLY launch-EXCLUSIVE armor set. The Dweller set is best described as: "If aliens were gladiators and gladiators were from the future."

Four Additional Dweller Skins

Atlantis - Legendary
- Description: alternates colors over time.
- Perfect for players who DO THE MOST.
*Shown in above image

Camo - Legendary
- Description: camo that moves on the armor as the user is wearing it.
- Ideal for those who like modern twists on classics.

Blaze - Epic
- Description: bronze, battle-worn armor.
- Only for those who boast about their successes in the arena.

Default Blue Skin - Common
-Description: - blue.
-If you want to be blue.
*This skin is blue.

Founder's Edition EXCLUSIVE Weapon Skin

The "Full" weapon skin is EXCLUSIVE to those who support the Splitgate: Arena Warfare developers by purchasing the Founder's Edition. You get the Full weapon skin for all 9 weapons!

Full - Epic

Bonus 5 SAW Packs

SAW Packs in Splitgate: Arena Warfare are used to unlock cosmetic armor sets, armor skins, weapon skins, emblems and more! 5 SAW Packs will grant you 15 cosmetic unlockables!

Bonus Two EXCLUSIVE "Founders" Emblems

Represent the Splitgate founding developers by wearing their humorous faces on your armor set!

Notes:
-All unlockables in Splitgate: Arena Warfare will be cosmetic enhancements and will absolutely NOT affect gameplay.
-The Founder's Edition can only be purchased once per account.

short_description: Enter the arena in STYLE with the Splitgate: Arena Warfare Founder's Edition.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Any dual core CPU
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 MB available space

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Splitgate: Arena Warfare - Founder's Edition

content_descriptors.notes: Splitgate: Arena Warfare is a first-person arena shooter. Blood is shown when a player gets shot. There is no gore.
